item.title: [COLOR yellowgreen][B][COLOR green]|[/COLOR][COLOR gold]|[/COLOR][COLOR red]|[/COLOR] As Aventuras do Bocas [COLOR red]•[/COLOR][COLOR white] [PT-PT] [/COLOR][/B]

regex.name: makelist3
regex.expres: spf-link " dir="ltr" href="\/watch\?v=(.*?)&.*?\n(.*)

regex.name: get-number
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url='https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLE08BA8EFC25BDE3C'): import requests import re headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Accept-Language': 'en-US'} rr = requests.get(url, headers=headers) number = re.findall('
  • (.*?) vid', rr.text)[0] #number = number.encode('unicode-escape') number = number.replace(',', '') real = int(float(number)) / 100 real2 = real + 3 liste = list(range(real2)) return liste

regex.name: get-source-page
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url='https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLE08BA8EFC25BDE3C'):
import requests import re import json
headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0'} r1 = requests.get(url, headers = headers) source = r1.text page = [makelist2.param1] N = int(float(page)) pre = 'https://www.youtube.com' if (N > 1):
for itr in range (1,N): continuex = re.findall('data-uix-load-more-href="(.*?)"', source)[0] continuationx = pre + continuex r = requests.get(continuationx, headers = headers) source = r.text jdata = json.loads(source) source = jdata["load_more_widget_html"] page = jdata["content_html"] return page
else:
return source

headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0'} r1 = requests.get(url, headers = headers) source = r1.text page = [makelist2.param1] N = int(float(page)) pre = 'https://www.youtube.com' if (N > 1):
for itr in range (1,N): continuex = re.findall('data-uix-load-more-href="(.*?)"', source)[0] continuationx = pre + continuex r = requests.get(continuationx, headers = headers) source = r.text jdata = json.loads(source) source = jdata["load_more_widget_html"] page = jdata["content_html"] return page
else:
return source
